Thanks @csarofeen. I updated the PR to call data<Half> so that it still does the dynamic type checking.

AT_FORALL_SCALAR_TYPES only defines it for the ATen Half struct. We use __half instead of at::Half in the Embedding kernel because math operations are defined only on __half.

body:
Thanks @csarofeen. I updated the PR to call `data<Half>` so that it still does the dynamic type checking.

`AT_FORALL_SCALAR_TYPES` only defines it for the ATen `Half` struct. We use `__half` instead of `at::Half` in the Embedding kernel because math operations are defined only on `__half`.
